pages.text: $(6)Skill Menu$() can be opened by pressing K. The first menu is a list of all skills and every skill have some traits. Click on the plus button in top right to level up a skill with your xp. Traits can be learned by reaching the required skill levels and consuming a skill point. $(c)Some items in the game require specific skills to be reached to use, e.g. Diamond sword requires attack level 6.
$(5)Upgrading skills require a lot of XP levels. If the '+' button on the top right doesn't show up, get more XP.
